General.Name: Mobile World Investment Corp
General.Description: Mobile World Investment Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides trading, repairing, and maintenance services for phones, information technology equipment and accessories, cameras, digital equipment, electronic equipment, household appliances, and related accessories in Vietnam. It also engages in retailing foods, beverages, products from meats, seafood, and vegetables. Mobile World Investment Corporation was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Thu Dau Mot, Vietnam.
